subject: RTSC Talk Show Sunday April 18th at 6pm est.--(Chris Fleming)
author: Urkel23
full_text:
RTSC Talk show welcomes a great guest to tomorrow's program. Chris Fleming is
very well known and respected in the field. He has been on several TV shows
including Ghost Hunters, Ghost Adventures and his own show Dead Famous to name a
few. He is a sensitive and the first to bring the SB7 to the world during the
Ghost Adventures Live event.

To learn more about Chris, please check out his site:

http://www.unknownmagazine.com/

To listen and chat, please tune in on this link:

http://www.stevehultay.com/rtsctalkradiogolive.html

Call in # is 732-587-7041 

Hope to see everyone there,
-Steve H.
